promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical butterfly fighting-type pokemon with ancient wings. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Monarchaeus, a a gigantic mythical butterfly fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Champ Buster, Sandpot Trap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "fighting" or "Monarchaeus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, butterfly-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Dwelling in canyon ecosystems, this colossus, Monarchaeus, epitomizes strength. Utilizing Champ Buster and Sandpot Trap, it governs territories with graceful authority.
